original_text: Then Saul and all the people who were with him rallied and went into the battle. And behold, every Philistine's sword was against his fellow, and there was very great confusion.
korean_text: 사울과 그와 함께 한 모든 백성이 모여 전장에 가서 본즉 블레셋 사람들이 각각 칼로 자기의 동무들을 치므로 크게 혼란하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul and all the people who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울과 그와 함께 있던 모든 백성이

sentences.original_text: every Philistine's sword was against his fellow
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 블레셋 사람의 칼이 그 동료를 향했습니다

sentences.original_text: and there was very great confusion
